parameters.name: Content-Language
parameters.description: Sets the content response language. Defaults to Hebrew (he).

CompanyNumber.description:
Customer registered company number (VAT number)
Optional field

ExternalIdentifier.description:
Customer external identifier.
External identifier from calling application. Optional field

NoVAT.description:
NoVAT indication
Set to true for VAT exempt customers Defaults to False

Name.description:
Customer full name (or company name)
Required for creating new customer (Leave empty to search by other fields)

ID.description:
OfficeGuy identifier
Leave empty to create a new entity or search by other fields when applicable

Folder.description:
Folder identifier.
Can be either application folder name, or FolderID.

CustomerHistoryURL.description: Link to the customer details page (  /)

UserErrorMessage.description: Error message, in a user readable format

TechnicalErrorDetails.description: Technical error details, let us know if you received this.

UserErrorMessage.description: Error message, in a user readable format

TechnicalErrorDetails.description: Technical error details, let us know if you received this.

EmailAddress.description:
Email address
Defaults to the customer email address

SenderUserID.description:
Sender user ID
Defaults to the company owner

Original.description:
Send original document if possible
Defaults to False

Language.description:
Email language
Defaults to the company language

UserErrorMessage.description: Error message, in a user readable format

TechnicalErrorDetails.description: Technical error details, let us know if you received this.

EmailAddress.description:
Recipient email address
Defaults to the customer email address

SendAsPaymentRequest.description: Send document as a payment request

IsDraft.description:
Save document as draft
Leave empty for final document

Date.description:
Document date
Defaults to the current date

SendByEmail.description: Send document by email after creation

Language.description:
Document language
Defaults to the company language

Currency.description:
Document currency
Defaults to the company currency

Description.description: Document description. The description is shown in the printed document.

Currency.description:
Price currency
Leave empty for company default

UnitPrice.description:
Unit price in ILS
Single unit price. Leave this empty for non-ILS documents and automatic exchange rate.

TotalPrice.description:
Total price in ILS
Leave this empty to auto calculate on ILS documents: Total price - Unit price * Quantity. Leave this empty for non-ILS documents and automatic exchange rate.

DocumentCurrency_UnitPrice.description:
Unit price in document currency
Single unit price in the document currency. Leave this empty for ILS documents / automatic exchange rate.

DocumentCurrency_TotalPrice.description:
Total price in document currency
Leave this empty to auto calculate: Total price - Unit price * Quantity. Leave this empty for ILS documents / automatic exchange rate.

Description.description: Document description. The description is shown in the printed document.

BankNumber.description:
Israeli bank number
For instance, 12 indicates Bank Hapoalim.

Israeli bank number
For instance, 12 indicates Bank Hapoalim.

Amount.description:
Received payment amount
Leave this empty for non-ILS documents and automatic exchange rate

DocumentCurrency_Amount.description:
Received payment amount
Leave this empty for ILS documents / automatic exchange rate

Details_General.description:
General details
Provide when payment method isn't detailed

Details_Cash.description:
Cash details
Provide when payment was made using cash

Details_BankTransfer.description:
Bank transfer details
Provide when payment was made using bank transfer

Details_Cheque.description:
Cheque details
Provide when payment was made using cheque

Details_CreditCard.description:
Credit card details
Provide when payment was made using external credit card

Details_Other.description:
Other details
Provide when payment was made using custom payment method

Details_Digital.description:
Digital details
Provide when payment was made using digital payment method

DocumentDownloadURL.description:
Document download URL
Produced document will be original on first visit, or certified copy on additional visits.

DocumentID.description:
OfficeGuy Document identifier
DocumentID is an internal identifier (also known as Card Number on OfficeGuy). Keep this for further API calls.

DocumentNumber.description:
Document number
For instance, for Invoice #1000, the DocumentNumber will be 1000.

UserErrorMessage.description: Error message, in a user readable format

TechnicalErrorDetails.description: Technical error details, let us know if you received this.

Items.description:
Document items
Can be used in Invoice, Invoice/Receipt, Proforma invoice etc.

Payments.description:
Document payments (Can be used in invoice+receipt/receipt)
Please note each payment should contain a single details object (Cash/BankTransfer/Cheque/CreditCard/Other), multiple payments are handled through the payments array.

VATIncluded.description:
Is VAT included in the prices?
Leave empty for false. Relevant for items only.

VATRate.description:
Document VAT Rate
Leave empty for company default. Relevant for items only.

OriginalDocumentID.description:
Original document identifier.
This allows keeping a relationship between an original and a created document (such as credits for debit invoices)

DocumentDownloadURL.description:
Document download URL
Produced document will be original (on first fetching), or certified copy.

UserErrorMessage.description: Error message, in a user readable format

TechnicalErrorDetails.description: Technical error details, let us know if you received this.

Payments.description:
Document payments
Please note each payment should contain a single details object (Cash/BankTransfer/Cheque/CreditCard/Other), multiple payments are handled through the payments array.

IsDraft.description:
Save document as draft
Leave empty for Draft document

VATRate.description:
Document VAT Rate
Leave empty for company default

VerifyLimitedAccount.description: Verifies if the account is limited in addition

Result.description:
Result status:
True = Valid bank account
False = Invalid bank account
Null = Unsupported bank

IsLimitedAccount.description:
Limited bank account status:
True = Bank account is limited
False = Bank account is not limited
Null = Bank account wasn't verified

Email address display on all documents
By default, the company email address will be displayed

AccountantEmailSpecified.description: Indicates if the AccountantEmail should be updated

AccountantEmail.description: Email address for sending all monthly documents each month

IncomeTaxCreditForDonation.description: Indicates whether the NPO is 46a donations approved, and should be presented on donation receipts

EnableCustomDocumentDates.description:
Indicates documents can be created in any custom date.
By default, documents can only be created in a sequence order.

DocumentsTheme.description:
Choose documents printing theme.
By default, documents are created using the Material theme.

Note that the document number has to be higher than the last issued document number. By default, all documents numbers are set to 1000.

ListTransactions.description:
Include detailed list per transaction
Defaults to false

Deposit_Failed.description: Transactions failed while depositing on Shva

Finished.description: Indication whether the billing process has finished

Transactions.description: Detailed list of transactions (Returned when ListTransactions = true)

CardNumber.description:
Full card number
Leave this empty when using FormatPreservingToken/CardToken/SingleUseToken

FormatPreservingToken.description:
Format preserving card number
Leave this empty when using CardNumber/CardToken/SingleUseToken

CardToken.description:
Card token
Leave this empty when using CardNumber/FormatPreservingToken/SingleUseToken

SingleUseToken.description:
Single use token, for all payment details (CardNumber, Expiration, CVV, CitizenID).
Used primarily by the Payments JavaScript API. (Leave this empty when using CardNumber/FormatPreservingToken/CardToken)

ExpirationMonth.description:
Card expiration month (1-12)
Leave this empty when using SingleUseToken

ExpirationYear.description:
Card expiration year (4 digits)
Leave this empty when using SingleUseToken

Amount.description:
Transaction amount
Leave this empty when using ParamJ = CheckDetails

PaymentsNonFirstCount.description:
Non-first payments count
Leave this empty for non-payments transaction

PaymentsFirstAmount.description:
First payment amount
Leave this empty for non-payments transaction

PaymentsNonFirstAmount.description:
Non-first payment amount
Leave this empty for non-payments transaction

Language.description:
Transaction language
Leave this empty to use the company default language

UniqueIdentifier.description:
Unique transaction identifier.
This parameter can be used for preventing duplicate transactions

MerchantNumber.description:
Shva merchant number (Terminal number).
This parameter should only be used when multiple merchants are defined in the company.

TransactionType.description:
Transaction type. This allows crediting or cancelling existing transaction.
Defaults to Debit

CustomData_1.description:
Custom user supplied data
Supports up to 100 chars in each field

Custom user supplied data

Supports up to 100 chars in each field

Custom user supplied data
Supports up to 100 chars in each field

CitizenID.description: Israel Citizen ID / Passport Number, this field may be stored on non pci-compliant systems

ForceFormatPreservingToken.description:
Forced format preserving token
This can be useful when migrating from another credit card gateway to OfficeGuy.
Please note the format preserving token should be a RANDOM identifier, which can't be reverse engineered into the card number (encoding/encrypting etc. isn't supported).

TechnicalErrorDetails.description: Technical error details, let us know if you received this.

UnitPrice.description:
Single unit price in payment currency
Defaults to the Item price

Currency.description:
Payment currency
Leave empty for company default currency

PaymentMethod.description:
Payment method details
Leave this empty to use the customer payment method, or when using the SingleUseToken

SingleUseToken.description:
Single use token, for all payment details (CardNumber, Expiration, CVV, CitizenID).
Used primarily by the Payments JavaScript API.

CreditCardAuthNumber.description: Transaction authorization number, as received from a previous Gateway Transaction

Payments_Count.description:
Payments count
Leave this empty to disable payments

Payments_FirstAmount.description:
First payment amount
Leave this empty to disable payments / automatic payments calculating

Payments_NonFirstAmount.description:
Non-first payment amount
Leave this empty to disable payments / automatic payments calculating

UpdateCustomerByEmail.description:
Update customer by email (notification email, with invoice/receipt download link)
Leave this empty to disable email sending feature

UpdateCustomerByEmail_AttachDocument.description:
Attach invoice/receipt to email
Defaults to False

UpdateCustomerByEmail_Language.description:
Update email language
Defaults to the company language

SendDocumentByEmail_Language.description:
Send document email language
Defaults to the company language

DocumentLanguage.description:
Document language
Defaults to the company language

DocumentDescription.description: Document description (the description is printed on the document)

VATIncluded.description:
Is VAT included in the prices?
Defaults to false

VATRate.description:
Document VAT Rate
Leave empty for company default. Relevant for items only.

AuthoriseOnly.description:
Should the transaction be committed, or authorized only.
Leave empty for "False" (Auto-Commit). This field could be used for testing the Charge action easily. Please note, when using AuthoriseOnly, documents will be issued as "Draft".

DraftDocument.description:
Create draft document?
Leave empty to use the application setting. Please note, when using AuthoriseOnly, documents will always be issued as "Draft".

DocumentType.description:
Create document type
Leave empty for default

SupportCredit.description:
Allow credit instead of charge (debit), in case the total is less than 0?
Defaults to false

MerchantNumber.description:
Shva merchant number (Terminal number).
This parameter should only be used when multiple merchants are defined in the company.

SendCopyToOrganization.description:
Send email to the organization as well. Defaults to the accounting application settings.
Relevant when using either UpdateCustomerByEmail or SendDocumentByEmail.

ValidPayment.description: Indicates if the payment is valid

RecurringCustomerItemIDs.description: Relevant only for payments originating from recurring payments

DocumentDownloadURL.description:
Document download URL
Produced document will be original (on first fetching), or certified copy.

UserErrorMessage.description: Error message, in a user readable format

TechnicalErrorDetails.description: Technical error details, let us know if you received this.

PaymentID.description:
PaymentID
Returned from the BeginRedirect or the Charge API methods

UserErrorMessage.description: Error message, in a user readable format

TechnicalErrorDetails.description: Technical error details, let us know if you received this.

VATIncluded.description:
Is VAT included in the prices?
Leave empty for false. Relevant for items only.

DocumentType.description:
Created document type
Leave empty for default

RedirectURL.description:
URL to redirect the user on successful payment.
The following parameters will be added to the URL: OG-CustomerID: Customer identifier OG-PaymentID: Payment identifier OG-ExternalIdentifier: The original ExternalIdentifier When empty, the user will be redirected the the customer payments history page

ExternalIdentifier.description:
External identifier.
This identifier will be appended to the RedirectURL on successful payment.

MaximumPayments.description:
Maximum payments (installments) allowed on the payment page.
By default, the maximum payments count is set according to the purchase pages application settings. Set to 0 to disable payments.

SendUpdateByEmailAddress.description: Email address to which the result document will be created following payments.

ExpirationHours.description:
Number of hours, in which the direct URL will expire.
Defaults to 1 hours. Maximum of 240 hours (10 days).

Header.description:
Payment page header
Defaults to the company name

UpdateOrganizationOnSuccess.description: Send payment notification to organization on successful payment

UpdateOrganizationOnFailure.description: Send payment notification to organization on failed payment

UpdateCustomerOnSuccess.description: Send payment notification to customer on successful payment.

DocumentDescription.description: Document description (the description is printed on the document)

RedirectURL.description:
Payment page URL.
Redirect your user to this page, in order to continue the payment process.

UserErrorMessage.description: Error message, in a user readable format

TechnicalErrorDetails.description: Technical error details, let us know if you received this.

IncludeInactive.description:
Also include inactive items
Defaults to false

Currency.description:
Price currency
Leave empty for company default

UnitPrice.description: Single unit price in payment currency

Currency.description:
Price currency
Leave empty for company default currency

Date_Start.description:
First payment date
Defaults to current date

Duration_Days.description:
Recurring duration/interval in days
For instance, for monthly payments, specify 0. For weekly payments, specify 7.

Duration_Months.description:
Recurring duration/interval in months
For instance, for monthly payments, specify 1

Recurrence.description:
Number of recurring payments
For instance, for 1 year of monthly payments, specify 12. Setting this to null or 0 will result in continuous payments

PaymentMethod.description:
Payment method details
Leave this empty to use the customer payment method, or when using the SingleUseToken

SingleUseToken.description:
Single use token, for all payment details (CardNumber, Expiration, CVV, CitizenID).
Used primarily by the Payments JavaScript API.

UpdateCustomerByEmail.description:
Update customer by email
Defaults to False

UpdateCustomerByEmail_AttachDocument.description:
Attach invoice/receipt to email
Defaults to False

AuthoriseOnly.description:
Should the transaction be committed, or authorized only.
Leave empty for "False" (Auto-Commit). This field could be used for testing the Charge action easily. Please note, when using AuthoriseOnly, documents will be created as "Draft", and recurring items will be created as cancelled.

DocumentType.description:
Created document type
Leave empty for default

SendCopyToOrganization.description:
Send email to the organization as well. Defaults to the accounting application settings.
Relevant when using UpdateCustomerByEmail.

VATIncluded.description:
Is VAT included in the prices?
Leave empty for false. Relevant for items only.

CreditCardPayments_Count.description:
Credit card payments count. Please note this is not the recurrence (how many months the transaction should last), this parameter shouldn't be used on most use cases.
Leave this empty to disable payments and use standard direct debit.

MerchantNumber.description:
Shva merchant number (Terminal number).
This parameter should only be used when multiple merchants are defined in the company.

DocumentDownloadURL.description:
Document download URL
Produced document will be original (on first fetching), or certified copy.

UserErrorMessage.description: Error message, in a user readable format

TechnicalErrorDetails.description: Technical error details, let us know if you received this.

Recurrence.description:
Number of pending recurring payments
For instance, for a total of 1 year of monthly payments, specify 12 Setting this to 0 will result in continuous payments. Please note this parameter cannot be used when the LastPaymentDate parameter is set.

LastPaymentDate.description:
Last payment date.
Please note this parameter cannot be used when the Recurrence parameter is set.

UserErrorMessage.description: Error message, in a user readable format

TechnicalErrorDetails.description: Technical error details, let us know if you received this.

AutomaticBilling_PaymentRequests.description: Automatic billing mode for charging existing payment requests

AutomaticBilling_TaxInvoices.description: Automatic billing mode charging existing tax invoices

AutomaticBilling_ChargeDocument.description: Default document type for charges billing

AutomaticBilling_DocumentsOnlyDocument.description: Default document type for documents only billing

User.description:

Applications.description:
List of applications to be installed on the created company.
Please note installing applications might incur additional charges.

ApplicationAdditions.description:
List of applications additions to be installed on the created company.
Please note this will incur additional charges.

HideFromCompaniesList.description:
Allows hiding the created company from the user companies list
Defaults to False
